entry.title: CLWT-067-PCIe™ - Closed Loop Wind Tunnel for PCIe Characterization

media:group.media:title: CLWT-067-PCIe™ - Closed Loop Wind Tunnel for PCIe Characterization
media:group.media:description:
The CLWT-067-PCIe™, is a unique closed loop wind tunnel for thermal characterization of components, boards and heat sinks. The unit is made of Aluminum, sheet metal and LEXAN™ and produces flows up to 1400 ft/min (7 m/s) and temperature up to 85°C. The CLWT-067-PCIe™ uses the proven technology of the CLWT-067 and adds a new m test section specially designed for the thermal testing and characterization of either full or half-height standard PCIe cards
Learn more here - https://www.qats.com/Products/Wind-Tunnels/Closed-Loop-Wind-Tunnels/CLWT-067-PCIe
https://www.qats.com Advanced Thermal Solutions, Inc. A leading-edge engineering and manufacturing company focused on the thermal management of electronics.

entry.title: ATS Vapor Chambers - Aluminum, Titanium & Copper

media:group.media:title: ATS Vapor Chambers - Aluminum, Titanium & Copper
media:group.media:description:
The ATS family of aluminum vapor chambers are the largest and broadest set of off-the-shelf vapor chambers available today. From 25x25mm (1x1in) to 250x250mm (9.8x9.8in). Made in the USA, the vapor chambers are also available in Copper and Titanium. The Role of Vapor Chamber (VC) Substrate-level thermal transport whether metallic or synthetic diamond substrates that have been used for their superior conduction heat transfer, are displaying inadequacies in spreading the heat for effective device cooling.
Learn more about ATS custom vapor chambers - https://www.qats.com/Products/Vapor-Chambers

media:group.media:title: What is a Vapor Chamber?
media:group.media:description:
A vapor chamber is a vacuum sealed heat spreader with a wick structure lining its inside walls. The wick is saturated with a working fluid and when heat is applied, the fluid at that location immediately vaporizes and the vapor rushes to fill the vacuum. When the vapor meets a cooler wall surface it condenses, releasing its latent heat. Learn more about how they function and their role in the thermal management of electronics with this video.

entry.title: How to Choose the Right Heat Sink Attachment - ATS Webinar Series

media:group.media:title: How to Choose the Right Heat Sink Attachment - ATS Webinar Series
media:group.media:description:
Choosing the right heat sink is part of deploying a good thermal management solution, the other part is the attachment method. Whether clip, push pin, z-clip, or other, the attachment has an important impact on how effective the thermal solution is. This webinar will cover these issues including attachments for rectangular packages increasingly used in SoC and SiP packages. A handy technical reference sheet and white paper on attachment types will be provided to those who register. This webinar, presented by ATS Product Engineering Manager, Greg Wong will address all these issues and more.
To register for future webinars please visit qats.com/Training/Webinars
https://www.qats.com Advanced Thermal Solutions, Inc. A leading-edge engineering and manufacturing company focused on the thermal management of electronics.

media:group.media:title: iQx™ Thermal Measurement System
media:group.media:description:
The iQx™ thermal measurement system is designed to be used wherever velocity, pressure, temperature and humidity measurements are required. It eliminates the need for multiple systems or additional software to synchronize data collection of different parameters.
Learn more here - https://www.qats.com/Products/Instruments/Temperature-and-Velocity-Measurement/iQx-100

entry.title: superGRIP™ - Attach a Heat Sink in Seconds!

media:group.media:title: superGRIP™ - Attach a Heat Sink in Seconds!
media:group.media:description:
superGRIP™ is a two component attachment system which can be installed in seconds and securely mounts heat sinks to a wide range of components, without needing to drill holes in the PCB. superGRIP™ provides a strong, even attachment force with minimal space required around the components perimeter, making it ideal for densely populated PCBs.
Learn more about the superGRIP™ heat sink attachment system here - https://www.qats.com/Heat-Sink/superGRIP

entry.title: ATS fanSINK™ Heat Sink Family Overview

media:group.media:title: ATS fanSINK™ Heat Sink Family Overview
media:group.media:description:
fanSINK™ heat sinks provide active cooling directly to BGA packages. The fans are securely screwed onto cross-cut, straight fin heat sinks. Their fins offer omni-directional airflow for optimum thermal performance. They attach to components using ATS maxiGRIP™ clip-on attachments, thermal tape, or push pins.
Learn more about the family of fanSINK™ heat sinks here - https://www.qats.com/eShop.aspx?productGroup=0&subGroup=2&q=fanSINK

entry.title: ATS TEChill - 1.4 kW of Cooling Power

media:group.media:title: ATS TEChill - 1.4 kW of Cooling Power
media:group.media:description:
The TEChill-1400A chiller and heater system is based on Thermoelectric devices (Peltier, TEC) that provide precision heating and cooling of the fluid medium. TECs are semiconductor refrigerators and heaters that have no moving parts. This eliminates the kinds of failures associated with vapor compression for refrigeration.
Learn more - https://www.qats.com/Products/Liquid-Cooling/Chillers/TEChill-1400A

entry.title: ATS Round Heat Pipe Bending Tools

media:group.media:title: ATS Round Heat Pipe Bending Tools
media:group.media:description:
The ATS Heat Pipe Bender is a precision engineering tool designed to give engineers and technicians accurate and thermally reliable heat pipe bends. The tool gives the user the ability to apply the right amount of leverage and torque in order to get the right bend. The tool also stops a user from over bending and thus reducing the heat pipes thermal performance.
Download the datasheet here - https://www.qats.com/DataSheet/Bender-Heat-Pipes

media:group.media:title: ATS VOSTOK Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers
media:group.media:description:
ATS’ VOSTOK, Minus80 series of ultra-low temperature refrigeration systems are designed and manufactured specifically for the long term storage of medical and laboratory products. ATS’ VOSTOK freezers are ideal for biological storage, including vaccines, viruses, germs, blood plasma, skin, bone marrow, sperm, and other biological, pelagic and special test products. ATS’ VOSTOK, Minus80 series includes a wide range of single self-cascade, dual-cascade and double-cooling refrigeration systems that comfortably cool to -86 °C. Additionally, the PortM80 is a portable ultra-low temperature freezer, ideal for vaccine distribution, especially the Covid-19 vaccine. With its optimized evaporator design and state-of-the-art compressor, all VOSTOK freezers comfortably cool to -86°C.
To learn more, visit: https://www.qats.com/Products/Vostok-Freezers

media:group.media:title: What is a Thermoelectric Cooler (TEC)?
media:group.media:description:
Thermoelectric devices are semiconductor heat or refrigeration units which use the Peltier effect to create a heat flux between the two surfaces of the module. Learn more about how they function and their role in the thermal management of electronics.

media:group.media:title: ATS Do-It-Yourself (DIY) Cold Plates
media:group.media:description:
The Do-It-Yourself (DIY) family of high-performance cold plates provides engineers with the freedom to drill holes to match the specific connection points of the electronic devices that are being cooled. Each cold plate has an etched "no drill zone" to provide a visual guide.

entry.title: Thermal Management Challenges in Medical Equipment - ATS Webinar Series

media:group.media:title: Thermal Management Challenges in Medical Equipment - ATS Webinar Series
media:group.media:description:
Thermal challenges in medical diagnostic equipment such as EKG machines, defibrillators, telemetry, ultrasound and other equipment present both similar challenges to other electronics as well as their own unique set of needs due to their importance in patients lives. This webinar will focus on the specific needs that medical diagnostic equipment requires.

media:group.media:title: ATS Tubed Cold Plates
media:group.media:description:
ATS tubed cold plates are a cost-effective thermal management solution for component cooling with a low to moderate heat load. ATS tubed cold plates are the right choice for cooling high-powered electronics, wind turbines, motor devices, automotive components, medical equipment, and any application where air cooling will not be sufficient.
For more information on ATS tubed cold plates visit our website – https://www.qats.com/Products/Liquid-Cooling
Available on Digi-Key Electronics - https://www.digikey.com/en/product-highlight/a/advanced-thermal-solutions/tubed-cold-plates
Available on Mouser Electronics - https://www.mouser.com/new/advanced-thermal-solutions/ats-tcp-tubed-cold-plates/

media:group.media:title: iFLOW-200™ - Cold Plate Characterization System
media:group.media:description:
The iFLOW-200™ system measures the thermal and hydraulic characteristics of a cold plate. It replaces the complex process of varying the volumetric flow rate of the coolant, and measuring the pressure drop and temperature of the cold plate. iFLOW-200™ users simply set up the starting flow, ending flow, number of test points, dwell time, power applied to the cold plate and other parameters in the coolingVIEW™ software and run the application.
Learn more about this system here - https://www.qats.com/Products/Instruments/Specialty-Instruments/iFLOW-200
